summary: The Royal Gorge Groove is a scenic trail running event in Ca√±on City, Colorado, that challenges participants with a variety of distances, including a signature 50K ultramarathon. Runners traverse rugged terrain along the dramatic rim of the Royal Gorge, where they encounter breathtaking 900-foot drop-offs and views of the Arkansas River. Organized by Aravaipa Running, the race is part of a festive multi-sport weekend that transitions from trail runs on Saturday to mountain bike races on Sunday.
uniqueFeatures: Spectacular Rim Running: The course features technical trails that hug the edge of the Royal Gorge, offering runners dizzying views of the Arkansas River from 900 feet above.
Multi-Sport Weekend: It is a unique 'Run & Bike' double-header event, allowing athletes to compete in trail runs on Saturday and return for mountain bike races on Sunday.
Diverse High-Country Terrain: The route blends rocky, technical climbs with fast, flowy singletrack and forest roads, reaching a maximum elevation of over 7,100 feet.
